document.full_text: the red bull driver cruised from pole position to victory and was the only driver who did not climb up and down the pack in what was an action-packed race from beginning to end.
document.title: vettel wins turkish grand prix for 3rd victory this season
lines_and_colors: the red bull driver cruised from pole position to victory and was the only driver who did not climb up and down the pack in what was an action-packed race from beginning to end.
